main: ^Bru, lekker brother. This looks like it’s gonna hit the spot before the jol again tonight.
^Great. Do you think you can get me to Plettenberg Bay now?
^For sho my chaana. You are such a decent ou bru, I’ll take you anywhere you need to go brotha
^Also, you are really a proper oak. Let me give you something brother. A recipe that always makes me feel lekker after the jol.
^The best pap n’ worse you’ll have in your liiife chaana.
^Thank you man, I love getting new recipes.
